text: @HillaryClinton @maddow The biggest problem with America covid-19 numbers is that the fed gov gives $ to the hospitals with covid patients. And there is the problem. I had a friend of mine going to the hospital with pneumonia was tested 3 X & tested neg all 3 X. He was still as covid related pneumonia!
